data.title: LANGUAGES
data.text: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, SASS, SQL

data.title: Developer, co-founder
text: • Creating, maintaining and improving customer and partner facing web applications
• Working with business stakeholders to move new applications and features from concept to implementation
• Working with developers and QA to build high quality, compatible and scalable solutions
• Developing UI components using modern languages and frameworks

data.title: Designer, founder
text: • Building and leading a team of creative professionals with backgrounds in copywriting, motion graphics, social and web design, video production
• Leading the creative process from idea to implementation, translating marketing objectives into clear creative strategies
• Producing innovative solutions for branding, style guides and other deliverables for use in projects, including print, digital, social media, web

data.title: Front-end Developer
text: • Maintaining and improving customer and partner facing web sites
• Developing new components and improve existing components to provide enhanced user experience
• Ability to rapidly convert visual mockups into functional, visually elegant applications
• Producing clean, efficient, maintainable and testable code based on specification

data.title: Senior Designer
text: • Developing the graphic elements and content of communications materials
• Preparing sketches, layouts and graphic elements
• Establishing guidelines for illustrators or photographers
• Co-ordinate all aspects of production for print, audio–visual or electronic materials
• Work in a multidisciplinary environment
• Supervising other designers

data.title: Head of Designers
text: • Designing wide variety of materials for external marketing use, including brochures, guides, white papers, presentations, email campaigns, website and social media banners
• Assist internal departments with graphic design needs

data.title: Web Developer, Designer
text: • Maintaining and improving company’s web site
• Rebranding of company, develop logo and guidelines
• Developing storyboards for electronic productions such as multimedia, interactive and digital products and television advertising and productions

data.title: Software Developer, Designer
text: • Creating and maintaining web sites
• Developing android applications
• Designing of collateral material, environmental graphics, books and magazines, corporate identity and branding, from concept to completion

data.title: Baltic State Technical University
text: • Software Engineer, MS in Information Systems and Technology

data.title: Additional
text: • Middle Front-End Developer, Yandex
